content:
ITEM NO.16               COURT NO.12               SECTION XVII
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
Civil Appeal  No(s).  6388/2025
DELHI ELECTRICITY REGULATORY COMMISSION            Appellant(s)
                                VERSUS
TATA POWER DELHI DISTRIBUTION LTD                  Respondent(s)
FOR ADMISSION 
IA No. 118137/2025 - STAY APPLICATION
 
Date : 04-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PAMIDIGHANTAM SRI NARASIMHA
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE R. MAHADEVAN
    (PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH)
For Appellant(s) : Mr. Nikhil Nayyar, Sr. Adv.
                   Mr. Dhananjay Baijal, AOR
                   Mr. Akshar Bhatt, Adv.
                   Mr. Kshitij Maheshwari, Adv.
                   Mr. Tilak Singh, Adv.                   
                   
For Respondent(s) :Mr. Kapil Sibal, Sr. Adv.
                   Mr. Amit Kapur, Adv.
                   Mr. Anupam Varma, Adv.
                   Mr. Pukhrambam Ramesh Kumar, AOR
                   Mr. Rahul Kinra, Adv.
                   Mr. Aditya Gupta, Adv.
                   Mr. Girdhar Gopal Khattar, Adv.
                   Mr. Adamya Ojha, Adv.
                   Mr. Yash Srivastava, Adv.
                   Ms. Manisha Singh, Adv.
                   Mr. Karun Sharma, Adv.
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
1. Issue notice on the Civil Appeal as well as on the application
for ad interim ex-parte stay.  Mr. Pukhrambam Ramesh Kumar,
learned counsel accepts notice on behalf of respondent on
caveat.
2. List after four weeks.
3. Liberty to file reply in the meanwhile.(INDU MARWAH)                                   (NIDHI WASON)
 AR-cum-PS                                   COURT MASTER (NSH)
